about-page-text: We care about our customers and are always happy to offer the highest quality products at pleasant, reasonable prices. Demidov Lux SPA LLC was founded in October 2014 and is included in the international catalog of the Moscow Export Center. Product quality and professional feedback are of highest priority in our work. Production and offices are located in Moscow and nearby, and you can buy our products from our partners, or by contacting us directly. We are always open to cooperation. Contact us at
cart-page-phone-number-empty: Please tell us your phone number
cart-page-phone-number-incorrect: Please tell use correct phone number
cart-page-email-incorrect: Please tell use correct email address
catalog-category-body-massage-oil-descri: The organoleptic properties and structure of our oils will pleasantly surprise professionals and aesthetes of organic care and professional practitioners of massage and SPA. Created by professional pharmacologists, elixirs will undoubtedly find a response from professionals and make your work more useful and fragrant.
catalog-category-face-massage-oil-descri: Excellent glide, excellent absorbency and no film on the skin surface when using ultra-light nourishing facial oils. Professional Delux SPA products are suitable for both massage procedures and facial skin care. Unique recipes for beauty and youth.
catalog-category-hair-massage-oil-descri: For a healthy appearance, hair needs constant nutrition and care. To solve these problems, a series of products based on jojoba oils and ultra-light vegetable and essential oils for course, intermittent and daily use has appeared. Stunning appearance and excellent condition of your hair after the first applications of hair oils from Delux SPA.
catalog-category-face-scrub-description-: Our face, like our body, in order to look young and well-groomed, requires regular cleansing of keratinized skin particles and impurities.

Organic facial scrub has a finely dispersed structure and plasticity, which makes the exfoliation procedure convenient and economical: just a pinch of paste and 40 seconds are enough for a thorough and accurate scrubbing procedure for radiance and skin health.
catalog-category-body-scrub-description: An amazing series of salt and coffee scrubs of various dispersities for body care and preparation for SPA procedures. A wide range of actions: from nutrition to detoxification, weight loss and recovery after stress and heavy loads.
catalog-category-oil-aromatherapy-descri: Organic essential oils for aromacology and the preparation of their own essential oil cocktails, as well as for the creation of craft and selective perfumes. Selected varietal oils from well-known manufacturers of high-quality and natural esters.
catalog-category-home-aromatherapy-descr: Aura and sensorics in balanced essential oil aroma cocktails, diffusers, sprays for rooms and laundry will create a unique handwriting and become a distinctive feature of your salon, as well as fill your home with harmony.
catalog-brief-massage-hair-oil: massage oil for hair growth and shine
